(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT A) (NN friend))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (NN mine))))
    (VP (VBD challenged)
      (S
        (NP (PRP me))
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB take)
            (NP (NN part))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (JJ photo) (NN competition))
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP (NN pledge)))))))))
    (. .)))


det(friend-2, A-1)
nsubj(challenged-5, friend-2)
prep(friend-2, of-3)
pobj(of-3, mine-4)
root(ROOT-0, challenged-5)
nsubj(take-8, me-6)
aux(take-8, to-7)
xcomp(challenged-5, take-8)
dobj(take-8, part-9)
prep(take-8, in-10)
det(competition-13, the-11)
amod(competition-13, photo-12)
pobj(in-10, competition-13)
prep(competition-13, at-14)
pobj(at-14, pledge-15)

  (S
    (VP (VB sg))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB So))
    (SBAR (IN since)
      (S
        (NP (PRP I))
        (VP (VBD wanted)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB do)
                (NP
                  (NP (NN something))
                  (ADJP
                    (NP (DT a) (RB little))
                    (JJ different)))))
            (, ,)))))))


root(ROOT-0, So-1)
mark(wanted-4, since-2)
nsubj(wanted-4, I-3)
dep(So-1, wanted-4)
aux(do-6, to-5)
xcomp(wanted-4, do-6)
dobj(do-6, something-7)
det(little-9, a-8)
npadvmod(different-10, little-9)
amod(something-7, different-10)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBD got)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (VP (VBD rejected)
            (SBAR (IN because)
              (S
                (NP (PRP they))
                (ADVP (RB only))
                (VP (VBP accept)
                  (SBAR
                    (S
                      (NP (NN jpg) (NNS files))
                      (ADVP (RB !!))
                      (VP (VBZ Goes)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB show)
                              (SBAR (IN that)
                                (S
                                  (NP (PRP you))
                                  (VP (VBP need)
                                    (S
                                      (VP (TO to)
                                        (VP (VB read)
                                          (NP (DT the) (NNS rules))
                                          (ADVP (RB first)))))))))))))))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN site))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (MD can) (RB all)
              (VP (VB share)
                (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS thoughts))
                (PP (IN about)
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WP what))
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP$ our) (NNP Singapore) (NNP Pledge))
                      (VP (VBZ means)
                        (PP (TO to)
                          (NP (PRP us)))))))))))))
    (. .)))

cop(site-4, is-2)
det(site-4, a-3)
root(ROOT-0, site-4)

aux(share-9, can-7)
advmod(share-9, all-8)
rcmod(site-4, share-9)
poss(thoughts-11, our-10)
dobj(share-9, thoughts-11)
prep(share-9, about-12)
dobj(means-17, what-13)
poss(Pledge-16, our-14)
nn(Pledge-16, Singapore-15)
nsubj(means-17, Pledge-16)
pcomp(about-12, means-17)
prep(means-17, to-18)
pobj(to-18, us-19)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD can)
      (ADVP (RB also))
      (VP (VB take)
        (NP
          (NP (NN part))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (DT the) (NN photo) (NN competition))))
        (PP (IN by)
          (S
            (VP (VBG submitting)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN photo))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a) (NN shot))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT any))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT the) (NN pledge) (NNS installations))
                            (VP (VBN located)
                              (PP (IN around)
                                (NP (DT the) (NNP Marina) (NNP Bayfront) (NN area))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(take-4, You-1)
aux(take-4, can-2)
advmod(take-4, also-3)
root(ROOT-0, take-4)
dobj(take-4, part-5)
prep(part-5, in-6)
det(competition-9, the-7)
nn(competition-9, photo-8)
pobj(in-6, competition-9)
prep(take-4, by-10)
pcomp(by-10, submitting-11)
det(photo-13, a-12)
dobj(submitting-11, photo-13)
prep(photo-13, of-14)
det(shot-16, a-15)
pobj(of-14, shot-16)
prep(shot-16, of-17)
pobj(of-17, any-18)
prep(any-18, of-19)
det(installations-22, the-20)
nn(installations-22, pledge-21)
pobj(of-19, installations-22)
partmod(installations-22, located-23)
prep(located-23, around-24)
det(area-28, the-25)
nn(area-28, Marina-26)
nn(area-28, Bayfront-27)
pobj(around-24, area-28)
